message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me over time.
Your cut decreases in value quicker Alice, so I think this is a fair counter offer.
Bob, my offer is still the same.  It's becoming clear that waiting benefits you more than me, but my time is valuable too.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a small hit to get this deal done.  Don't be greedy.
Alice, the longer this goes on the worse it is for you. I'm offering a deal where I benefit, to encourage you to be realistic about the situation.
Okay, Bob, you've made your point.  Let's split the difference from our previous offers. This is the best I can do.
